* BrightBlade popped another grape into her mouth, she hadn't even moved a 
cybertronic muscle when the other Predacon had made the scene. She sighed as 
she then looked up at Gangon, she had heard what he had said about kooks. 
She snickered, how wrong he was.*

" That isn't always true, Gangon. Some bots that may seem strange can be 
smarter then you know. Slag, you say that some bots like Dinobot and 
Tavatron are kooks when I know that you're wrong, that lizardbot of Tvatrons 
there could rip both you and I apart and not even break a sweat."

* BrightBlade hated to admit it but there were more powerful bots then 
Gangon and herself, even though she knew that her hacking and hot-wiring 
skills were almost unmatched.
She popped another piece of fruit in her mouth and chewed thoughtfully, 
yes...there were more powerful bots then Gangon and herself.
Another bot that concerned her was that 3ed in command of Liono's, what was 
her name? Iron Raptor?
Well, there was a bot with a beast mode that kicked ass, literally!
BrightBlade smiled, she wondered what sort of prize she would get from Hell 
Beast if she and Gangon could manage to bag that bot!
It was risky and she doubted that she could pull it off but just think, a 
beast mode like that fighting on the Predacons side!
She crossed her arms in frontt of her and snickered, that would have to 
worth some type of prize...didn't it?
BrightBlade sighed as she extinguished the idea, she would most likely end 
up dead if she so much as tried, she picked off another grape and swallowed 
it. But it was nice to dream.*
